trans-unit.source: Represents a tablet pen used with a Tablet PC.
trans-unit.target: A Táblagép használt toll jelöli.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> , amely jelzi, hogy a stylus aktuális bemenete.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the stylus.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> , amely jelzi, hogy a stylus aktuális bemenete.

trans-unit.source: Binds input from the stylus to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: A megadott elem a stylus a megadott kötések.

trans-unit.source: The element to which the stylus is bound.
trans-unit.target: Az elem, amely a stylus kötődik.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input element is captured successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a bemeneti elem rögzített sikeresen; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: elementis .

trans-unit.source: element is neither or .
trans-unit.target: elementis neither or .

trans-unit.source: Binds the stylus to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: A megadott elem a stylus van kötve.

trans-unit.source: The element to which the stylus is bound.
trans-unit.target: Az elem, amely a stylus kötődik.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Egy a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref> értékeket.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input element is captured successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a bemeneti elem rögzített sikeresen; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that captured the stylus.
trans-unit.target: A stylus rögzített elem beolvasása.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that captured the stylus.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> , amely a stylus rögzíti.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that the pointer is positioned over.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> , hogy a mutató fölé kerül.

trans-unit.source: The element the pointer is over.
trans-unit.target: A mutató elem alatt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a stylus pozícióját.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x,y`) coordinates are mapped.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> , amelyhez a (`x,y`) koordináták százalékosan vannak leképezve.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the position of the stylus, in relation to relativeTo.
trans-unit.target: A , amely a stylus pozícióját jelöli kapcsolatban relativeTo .

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois neither or .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Értéket ad vissza egy <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> tartalmazó <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> a stylus gyűjtött objektumok.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x,y`) coordinates in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> , amelyhez a (`x,y`) a koordinálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> le vannak képezve.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects that the stylus collected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> tartalmazó <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objektumokat, amelyeket a stylus összegyűjteni.

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois neither or .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Értéket ad vissza egy <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> tartalmazó <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> a stylus gyűjtött objektumok.

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Használja a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` must be compatible with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> used by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> method.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo`kompatibilisnek kell lennie a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>használják a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29>metódus.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> before calling the GetStylusPoints method.
trans-unit.target: Használja a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>metódus használatával kérje le a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>a GetStylusPoints metódus hívása előtt.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x y`) coordinates in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> , amelyhez a (`x y`) a koordinálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> le vannak képezve.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> tartalmazó <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> a stylus gyűjtött objektumok.

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois neither or .

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier for the stylus device.
trans-unit.target: A stylus eszköz lekéri az azonosító.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the stylus device.
trans-unit.target: A stylus eszköz azonosítója.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the tablet pen is positioned above, yet not in contact with, the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi, hogy a tábla toll fent, de nem szerepelnek, a digitalizáló helyezkedik el.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen is positioned above, yet not in contact with, the digitizer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a toll található fent, de nem szerepelnek, a digitalizáló; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the tablet pen is in range of the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a tábla toll a digitalizáló számos lekérdezi.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen is within range of the digitizer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a digitalizáló; tartományán belül van-e a tollal Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the secondary tip of the stylus is in use.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a másodlagos hegye és a stylus használja.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the secondary tip of the stylus is in use; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a másodlagos hegye és a stylus van használatban; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a stylus device is valid.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a stylus eszköz érvényes lekérdezi.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate a stylus is valid; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>érvényes; tollal utaló Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a stylus nevét.

trans-unit.source: The name of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: A stylus neve.

trans-unit.source: Gets the stylus buttons on the stylus.
trans-unit.target: A stylus a stylus gombok beolvasása

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusButtonCollection"></xref> object representing all of the buttons on the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Egy hivatkozást egy <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusButtonCollection"> </xref> a stylus gombok mindegyikével képviselő objektum.

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes the cursor and the user interface.
trans-unit.target: A kurzor és a felhasználói felület szinkronizál.

trans-unit.source: Applications may need to locate the element that the cursor is positioned over.
trans-unit.target: Keresse meg az elem, a kurzor fölé alkalmazások kell.

trans-unit.source: If the application uses animation, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A> method might return an element that has moved out from under the cursor.
trans-unit.target: Ha az alkalmazás animáció, használja a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>metódus lehet, hogy vissza, amely a kurzor bejegyzésében helyezte egy elem.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call Synchronize to be sure that <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A> returns the proper element.
trans-unit.target: Ügyeljen arra, hogy a szinkronizálás hívás <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>a megfelelő elem beolvasása.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> representing the digitizer associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref> az aktuális társított digitalizáló képviselő <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> represents the digitizer associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref> jelenti. a jelenlegi társított digitalizáló <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that receives input.
trans-unit.target: Az elem, amely lekérdezi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> object that receives input.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> , amely megkapja a bemeneti objektum.

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the stylus device.
trans-unit.target: A stylus eszköz nevét adja vissza.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Neve a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.
